name: Laia, Clàudia i Estel
desc: La Laia, la Clàudia i l’Estel estudien a la Universitat de Barcelona. Vénen de pobles del voltant, i l’única manera de viure a la capital era compartint pis. Va costar, però finalment es van trobar i van aconseguir llogar aquest apartament. Hi porten un any, i ja són bones amigues. El pis és petit, però s’hi han fet el seu raconet a la gran ciutat, i esperen poder-s’hi quedar, juntes, fins que acabin els estudis.
descENG: Laia, Clàudia, and Estel study at the University of Barcelona. They come from nearby towns, and the only way to live in the city was by sharing an apartment. It wasn’t easy, but they finally found each other and managed to rent this flat. They’ve been living there for a year and have become good friends. The flat is small, but they’ve made it their own little safe corner in the big city, and they hope to stay here together until they finish their studies.
